messages.subject: Online Magazines!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there everyone! It is time to email your thoughts and ideas for your magazine, plus for the children to email and share what they ve been doing in
messages.messageBody:
Hi there everyone!

It is time to email your thoughts and ideas for your magazine, plus
for the children to email and share what they've been doing in
homeschooling!

For the Homeschool Kids Magazine, please email to:
homeschool_kids_magazine@...

For the Homeschool Mums (& Dads!) Magazine, please email to:
mumof4nz@...

FRUGAL FAMILIES MAGAZINE:
I have developed one more magazine to do with another area that I
love - a Frugal Families Magazine. This is a magazine for families
and by families!
To check it out (later today):
http://pages.ivillage.com/oneofusnz/frugalfamiliesmagazine

If you would like to share any tips and ideas for this magazine,
please (yes, please!!) email them to:
oneofusnz@...

Thanks everyone!

Teresa :)
